menu

Class AddDishController

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.AddDishController

  • public class AddDishController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for adding a new dish, Used in CreateNewMenuScreen when a user pressed the PLUS icon opens AddDishScreen where user can add a new dish not directly to the menu but to the potential dishes that can be added(left side list view)
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    matan weisberg

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      button for confirming inputted name
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField dish_name_input
      text are for user to input a dish name
      private MyListener dishName
      myListener class to pass data about the dishname user inputted back to createnewmenu
      private javafx.scene.control.Label result_lbl
      label to display messages to user
      private java.lang.String type
      dishes type (main , side ,etc)

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddDishController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void addDish(javafx.event.Event event)
      addDish function activates on button press add_btn we send the new dish to our server if the dish doesnt already exist we pass on that dish name and type back to create new menu so it can be added to potential dishes(left list view)
      void initialize()
      initializes our controller so that enter key also works for inputting a dish name
      void setListener(MyListener dishName)
      setter for Listener that Create new menu passes
      void setType(java.lang.String type)
      setter for dish type that Create new menu passes
